amendment.description: Amendment allocates $5 million to carry out the Food and Drug Administration's antibiotic resistance plan.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide that $5,000,000 is available for the purpose of carrying out the responsibilities of the FDA with respect to antibiotic drugs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brown (OH) amendment (A009) Agreed to by recorded vote: 271 - 140 (Roll no. 209).
